【新車登場】優雅與力量-- Vesta Primavera S 125 i-get ABS特仕版
06 Nov 2019, 11:30 by 鞠豪傑 Jet Chu
繼去年成功推出大受市場歡迎的兩款Primavera特仕版— Yacht Club遊艇特仕版與50週年特仕版後，今年Vespa原廠Piaggio特別將Primavera優雅的氣質與力量結合，注入了活潑朝氣的氣息，打造出Primavera S限量特仕版，其中的S代表了Sporty，讓Vespa Primavera S 特仕版成為最具熱情的Primavera，並推出專屬全新車色：星湛灰與霓虹橘，兩色各限量60台在台上市。


Vespa Primavera S 特仕版（星湛灰）。

在1968年誕生的Vespa Primavera （義大利語：「春天」之意），從推出之際就因為其小巧、敏捷、時尚的外型，廣受全世界速克達車迷的喜愛，並成為極具Vespa經典的象徵車款之一。


特仕版專屬配件包括車身飾條、前土除飾蓋、輪圈、前後車燈邊框等，黑色座椅則使用橘色縫線增添活力色彩，車側並有專屬的運動車貼。

以Vespa經典的鋼製單體式車架打造的Primavera S特仕版，此次推出兩款全新的車色—質感霧面的星湛灰、以及光澤亮面的霓虹橘；在外觀上，Primavera S特仕版擁有了極具風格的專屬設計，讓人一眼就能看出屬於它的不凡魅力，包括黑灰色系的領結飾蓋（搭配搶眼的橘色V型喇叭飾蓋）、車身飾條、前土除飾蓋、輪圈、前後車燈邊框等，黑色座椅則使用橘色縫線增添活力色彩，車側並有專屬的運動車貼，讓Primavera S特仕版更為顯眼。Vespa Primavera S特仕版搭載了12吋鋁合金五幅輪圈，提供車輛較佳的穩定性與安全性，並確保即使在不同路況的道路騎乘時，依然有良好的抓地力，並配備LED頭尾燈與日行燈、晶片防盜系統、與前輪ABS碟式煞車系統，給車主安心的騎乘標準。


車頭特徵為黑灰色系的領結飾蓋，搭配搶眼的橘色V型喇叭飾蓋（霓虹橘）。

全新Primavera S特仕版全面到港，新車上市期間，Vespa總代理太古運通推出高額零利率分期或專屬交車好禮方案二選一，喜歡Vespa的車迷朋友們可至Vespa各授權經銷據點欣賞Primavera S特仕版的獨特魅力!

[New car debut] elegance and strength - Vesta Primavera S 125 i-get ABS version
06 Nov 2019, 11:30 by 鞠豪杰 Jet Chu
Following last year's successful launch of two popular Primavera editions - Yacht Club and the 50th Anniversary Edition, this year's Vespa original Piaggio combines the elegant temperament and strength of Primavera with a lively vigor. Breath, create a Primavera S limited edition official version, where S represents Sporty, make Vespa Primavera S special version of the most passionate Primavera, and launched a new car color: star Zhan gray and neon orange, two colors each A limited edition of 60 units is on the market.


Vespa Primavera S Special Edition (Star Cham).

The Vespa Primavera (Italian: "Spring" meaning), which was born in 1968, has been widely loved by fans around the world because of its small size, agility and fashion. One of the symbols of the Vespa classic.


Exclusive accessories for the special edition include body trim, front soil trim cover, rims, front and rear light borders, etc. The black seats use orange stitching to add vibrant color, and the car side has exclusive sports car stickers.

The Primavera S version, built with Vespa's classic steel monocoque frame, introduces two new car colors – the star-stamped gray matte and the shiny neon orange; in appearance, Primavera S has a unique style of design that makes it easy to see at a glance, including the black-gray bow tie (with eye-catching orange V-shaped speaker cover), body trim The strips, the front soil cover, the rims, the front and rear lights, etc., the black seats use orange stitching to add vitality, and the car side has exclusive sports car stickers, making the Primavera S special version more conspicuous. Vespa Primavera S is equipped with 12-inch aluminum alloy five-wheel rims to provide better stability and safety, and to ensure good grip and LEDs even when riding on different roads. Head and tail lights and daytime running lights, chip anti-theft system, and front wheel ABS disc brake system, give riders peace of mind riding standards.


The front is characterized by a black-gray bow tie trim with an eye-catching orange V-shaped flared cover (neon orange).

The new Primavera S special version is fully arrived in Hong Kong. During the new car launch, Vespa general agent Taikoo Express launched a high-value zero-interest rate or exclusive delivery plan. The fans who like Vespa can go to Vespa's authorized distribution bases. The unique charm of Primavera S!
